Class SoundBuffer

java.lang.Object
org.jsfml.internal.SFMLNativeObject
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.core.SFMLNativeObject
org.jsfml.audio.SoundBuffer
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.audio.SoundBuffer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConstSoundBuffer, Const
public class SoundBuffer extends org.jsfml.audio.SoundBuffer implements ConstSoundBuffer
Buffer of audio samples, providing an audio data source for a Sound.
